name: MDF: Magical Defense Force
description:
A Magical Girl blew into town one day, rescuing local cynical loner Frank Krieg. Due to circumstances beyond their control, they now have to live together.
Frank and Michiki will attempt to survive evil monsters, secret organizations, school, and each other as they seek out other Magical Girls like her.

This story features multiple battles with dangerous "monsters of the week", fully animated transformation scenes, a diverse soundtrack, all with a comedic attitude.
